pwd (or pwn) — prints the name of the working directory (root user namespace)¶

FORM

pwd
pwn

For the moment, pwd and pwn (print working directory/namespace) both execute whoami. At some point in the future, fish may support the notion of a working namespace and a cd command; this is only really relevant if the user chooses to use unix-style paths with fish.

Previous topic

mkdir — makes a new namespace (the Fluidinfo equivalent of a directory)

Next topic

abouttag — returns the canonical about tag for an object based on properties
